H0.text: Satya Nadella, boss of which vast corporation, apologised in 2014 for suggesting female workers should rely on faith and karma instead of asking for a pay rise. Google

H1.text: Satya Nadella, boss of which vast corporation, apologised in 2014 for suggesting female workers should rely on faith and karma instead of asking for a pay rise. Amazon

H3.text: Satya Nadella, boss of which vast corporation, apologised in 2014 for suggesting female workers should rely on faith and karma instead of asking for a pay rise. MSLI

A5.text: Nadella was criticised for the statement and he later apologized on Twitter.

A6.text: On 4 February 2014, Nadella was announced as the new CEO of Microsoft.
